title: Novel imaging technique brings diagnostic potential into operating room

title_detail.value: Novel imaging technique brings diagnostic potential into operating room

summary: Researchers have successfully visualized the tumor microenvironment of human breast tissue shortly after it was surgically removed from a patient in the operating room. The researchers achieved this using a new portable optical imaging system.

summary_detail.value: Researchers have successfully visualized the tumor microenvironment of human breast tissue shortly after it was surgically removed from a patient in the operating room. The researchers achieved this using a new portable optical imaging system.
